name: Kika Keyboard 2020 - Emoji Keyboard, Stickers, GIF
description: New Emoji Keyboard - Type on Message, SMS, Text Now, Email, Note, etc - Easy to send emoji message with various funny emoji & text emoticons  - Innovative emoji prediction with emoji dictionary  Sticker & GIF Keyboard -Send stickers/clip art and GIFs on any social Apps -Lots of funny animated GIFs to choose from, such as photo GIFs, cat GIFs & Emotion GIFs  Custom Keyboard & Photo Keyboard  -Personalize keyboard color, font, key press sound -Set keyboard background with pictures from gallery or camera -Resize keypad with one-handed mode and split keyboard layout for phone and tablet  Fast typing - Slide input: slide your finger key to key swiftly  - Smart auto-correction & word prediction helps you kill typos  - Voice Board: Easy voice typing on the go with Voice Board   Bilingual Keyboard supports 60+ languages  - 60+ keyboard layouts and dictionary, including QWERTY keyboard, AZERTY keyboard, English(US)(UK), Portuguese(Brazil)(Portugal), Spanish keyboard, German Keyboard, Ukrainian keyboard, Thai keyboard, Turkish keyboard, etc.  We also support Bashkir Language Layout  Contact us  Facebook: www.facebook.com/KikaKeyboard Official Website: www.kikatech.com Support & Feedback: support@kikatech.com
